properties.title: ForestScan
properties.description: investigate novel technologies such as Terrestrial Laser Scanning (TLS) and Unmanned Aerial Vehicle-based Laser Scanning (UAV-LS) to complement manual plot based measurements of AGB by collecting and analysing such data for three tropical sites in French Guiana (Paracou), Gabon (Lop√©) and Malayisa (Sepilok). In addition at each of these sites airborne laser scanning data is available.
properties.osc:consortium: UCL CONSULTANTS LTD (GB), CIRAD (FR), IRD (FR), UNIVERSITY OF CAMBRIDGE (GB), UNIVERSITY OF EDINBURGH (GB), UNIVERSITY OF LEEDS (GB), WAGENINGEN UNIVERSITEIT (NL)
